Description:
Notice Serial Number:  IN 16082021/MMJ/AMO1   311820757
You have failed to ensure, so far as is reasonably practicable, that persons not in your employment are not exposed to risks to their health and safety in that you have failed to provide a securely fenced area for children on the farm to use when unsupervised and you have failed to segregate children from work traffic routes and other work activity where possible.
